resources.string: Access to account information is required to sign in.
Grocery store is not in stock yet.
I am a full meow. Don\'t make me a fat meow.
Well, we don\'t have any food you stupid.
Food! Finally you did something awesome!

string-array.name: happy_chat_array
string-array.item: Talk to me more and more and meow and meow ~.~
I want...meow meow meow (Why I can talk?)
I am always...sleepy. I am sleepy the cat!
Meow, don\'t forget me. Don\'t forget to feed me.

string-array.name: normal_chat_array
string-array.item: Well, you are not that bad.
What are you doing? How about feed me?
Do you know the weather tomorrow?\n How about go buying foods?
C\'est la vie. No surprise, not too bad.

string-array.name: hungry_chat_array
string-array.item: You know you are a bad servant
Feed me before I eat you
